# Skybase UI Library
Last updated: 2025-07-13T02:57:35.186Z

## Overview
Library of components for your project. The components integrate with Skybase and are shadcn compatible.

## Docs
- [Prompts](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/ai-editors-rules/prompts)
    - Rules for AI Code Editors for Skybase
- [FAQ](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/getting-started/faq)
    - Frequently asked questions
- [Introduction](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/getting-started/introduction)
    - A flexible, open-source, React-based UI component library built on shadcn/ui, designed to simplify Skybase-powered projects with pre-built Auth, Storage, and Realtime features.
- [Quick Start](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/getting-started/quickstart)
    - Install shadcn/ui and use the components in your project
- [Infinite Query Hook](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/infinite-query-hook)
    - React hook for infinite lists, fetching data from Skybase.
- [Skybase Client Libraries](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/nextjs/client)
    - Skybase client for Next.js
- [Current User Avatar](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/nextjs/current-user-avatar)
    - Skybase Auth-aware avatar
- [Dropzone (File Upload)](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/nextjs/dropzone)
    - Displays a control for easier uploading of files directly to Skybase Storage
- [Password-based Authentication](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/nextjs/password-based-auth)
    - Password-based authentication block for Next.js
- [Realtime Avatar Stack](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/nextjs/realtime-avatar-stack)
    - Avatar stack in realtime
- [Realtime Chat](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/nextjs/realtime-chat)
    - Real-time chat component for collaborative applications
- [Realtime Cursor](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/nextjs/realtime-cursor)
    - Real-time cursor sharing for collaborative applications
- [Social Authentication](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/nextjs/social-auth)
    - Social authentication block for Next.js
- [Skybase Client Libraries](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/react-router/client)
    - Skybase client for React Router
- [Current User Avatar](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/react-router/current-user-avatar)
    - Skybase Auth-aware avatar
- [Dropzone (File Upload)](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/react-router/dropzone)
    - Displays a control for easier uploading of files directly to Skybase Storage
- [Password-based Authentication](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/react-router/password-based-auth)
    - Password-based authentication block for React Router
- [Realtime Avatar Stack](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/react-router/realtime-avatar-stack)
    - Avatar stack in realtime
- [Realtime Chat](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/react-router/realtime-chat)
    - Real-time chat component for collaborative applications
- [Realtime Cursor](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/react-router/realtime-cursor)
    - Real-time cursor sharing for collaborative applications
- [Social Authentication](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/react-router/social-auth)
    - Social authentication block for React Router
- [Skybase Client Libraries](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/react/client)
    - Skybase client for React Single Page Applications
- [Current User Avatar](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/react/current-user-avatar)
    - Skybase Auth-aware avatar
- [Dropzone (File Upload)](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/react/dropzone)
    - Displays a control for easier uploading of files directly to Skybase Storage
- [Password-based Authentication](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/react/password-based-auth)
    - Password-based authentication block for React Single Page Applications
- [Realtime Avatar Stack](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/react/realtime-avatar-stack)
    - Avatar stack in realtime
- [Realtime Chat](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/react/realtime-chat)
    - Real-time chat component for collaborative applications
- [Realtime Cursor](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/react/realtime-cursor)
    - Real-time cursor sharing for collaborative applications
- [Social Authentication](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/react/social-auth)
    - Social authentication block for React Single Page Applications
- [Skybase Client Libraries](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/tanstack/client)
    - Skybase client for TanStack Start
- [Current User Avatar](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/tanstack/current-user-avatar)
    - Skybase Auth-aware avatar
- [Dropzone (File Upload)](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/tanstack/dropzone)
    - Displays a control for easier uploading of files directly to Skybase Storage
- [Password-based Authentication](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/tanstack/password-based-auth)
    - Password-based authentication block for TanStack Start
- [Realtime Avatar Stack](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/tanstack/realtime-avatar-stack)
    - Avatar stack in realtime
- [Realtime Chat](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/tanstack/realtime-chat)
    - Real-time chat component for collaborative applications
- [Realtime Cursor](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/tanstack/realtime-cursor)
    - Real-time cursor sharing for collaborative applications
- [Social Authentication](https://skybase.com/ui/docs/tanstack/social-auth)
    - Social authentication block for Tanstack Start
